name: Meghan Callandriello
enjoy: I love the VH community and the destressing events, like cup stacking and the hand spa!
funfact: I’ve been to 6/7 continents and all 50 states.

name: Ben Redmond
enjoy: It's so cool to see a community of hackers getting together for a weekend to achieve one common goal of producing an interesting product.
funfact: I skipped 5th grade, so I never had to learn stuff like capitals of states (still not sure if South Dakota even exists...).

name: Aadarsh Jha
enjoy: It's an honor meeting such talented individuals - specifically, my co-president Sayd. I cherish these days to be able to work alongside such a breath-taking individual.
funfact: In my spare time, I like to dabble in the art of yodeling.

name: Anna Zhang
enjoy: As an ops member, it's fun making the decisions for what food we serve. I also enjoy serving as a mentor to new members.
funfact: I was once #1 in the world for Crossy Roads.

name: Claire Yan
enjoy: I think I enjoy most all the decorating/theme-based things we do bc I feel like it can contribute a lot to the atmosphere of a hackathon.
funfact: I've never broken a bone before.

name: Katelyn Itano
enjoy: It's been fun working with and getting to know all these talented people.
funfact: I've had three concussions.

name: Paavas Bhasin
enjoy: We give a unified voice to the immensely diverse VH community and help forward the mission of VandyHacks with every single thing that we do.
funfact: One summer, I interned with a stand-up comedian to create a late night talk show for him!

name: Sam Lee
enjoy: Everyone is super supportive, and we all want each other to learn and grow.
funfact: According to my hand shape, I would be an earth bender.

name: Tim O'Brien
enjoy: I love teaching workshops and hearing different people's ideas.
funfact: I speak 3 languages.

name: Keshvi Mahalingam
enjoy: I like figuring out how to do new and interesting things with programming.
funfact: I have dual citizenship in the U.S. and the U.K.

name: Lu Cao
enjoy: I really like the people on my committee and getting to build relationships with sponsors.
funfact: My sister goes to Vandy (med school), as well.

name: Chuka Munkh-Achit
enjoy: The memes.
funfact: I can use a Japanese abacus to do basic calculations.

name: Juyoung Kim
enjoy: All the other Dev members are so willing to lend a hand.
funfact: I build a ton of hobby kits in my spare time.

name: Ananya Gondi
enjoy: All of board is so talented and creative. I love hanging out with y'all :).
funfact: If I sneeze, I sneeze at least 5 times in a row.

name: Jerry Qin
enjoy: Sponsorship has (some of) the coolest ppl in VH.
funfact: I was named after the mouse from Tom and Jerry.

name: Evelyn Mulyono
enjoy: How funny and supportive everyone is!
funfact: Once, I fell asleep while I was singing in front of the whole class.

name: Siraphob (Ben) Phipathananunth
enjoy: Everyone has a big brain.
funfact: I speak 3 languages fluently - English, Thai, and Spanish!

name: Gabriel Ting
enjoy: I'm always learning something from our team–I really love them.
funfact: I saw BTS in concert in NYC :P.

name: Sam Bender
enjoy: We specialize in creating unique experiences that makes VandyHacks stand out from other hackathons.
funfact: I can solve a Rubik's cube in less than 20 seconds.

name: Sophia Chen
enjoy: Fun fact - marketing is the smallest team on VH at four people! It's nice having a smaller team since we can be more tight knit and meetings feel more personable.
funfact: I hold dual citizenship in Canada and America.

name: Saydolimkhon Agzamkhodjaev
enjoy: It's been such a pleasure leading a hard-working, kind, and motivated team.
funfact: Men in Black was my favorite childhood movie.

name: Ilya Ermakov
enjoy: It's great seeing everybody's full devotion to work and desire to make things better.
funfact: I was born on Pi Day!

name: William Zhao
enjoy: Everyone's super driven about helping hackers and teaching them new technologies.
funfact: I know how to play the clarinet.

name: Vanessa Pei
enjoy: Basically everything! Everyone's super nice and very helpful :).
funfact: My MBTI test result is ENFP!

name: Jacky Zhang
enjoy: IMHO, we are the most fashionable committee :).
funfact: I'm a huge space nerd.

name: Alex Cuc
enjoy: We have a lot of fun together even when we're not talking about VH!
funfact: I can drive a stick-shift.

name: Seok Hee Hong
enjoy: I get to learn so much while teaching others! (as in, I get to spread the love ahaha)
funfact: I love cheese!

name: Amy Chen
enjoy: For content, we teach and spread the knowledge and welcome others into the world of CS. We enjoy doing our work which the best part of it!
funfact: I turned 18 twice! Guess how I did it.

name: Kathy Zhang
enjoy: We're a really chill and creative committee, and it's really great being able to talk about art/design with people who are passionate about the same thing!
funfact: I can't stay up past 10 pm.

name: Fay Zhang
enjoy: I love to brainstorm different activity ideas with my committee to help to enhance the hackathon experience.
funfact: I've been to boarding school since the first grade.

name: Christina Woodrow
enjoy: Everyone pitches in to stay on track. It's easy to mutually voice opinions.
funfact: I love plants & have a massive collection of (thriving) succulents & orchids!

name: Terry Luo
enjoy: I like how content members directly engage with hackers through workshops.
funfact: I'm really bad at baking!

name: Zinnie Zhang
enjoy: It has to be the people!
funfact: I can bake bagels from scratch!

name: Aadi Bajpai
enjoy: I love the people—old and new.
funfact: I like to pick cherries!
